original_title: Terror of Prehistoric Bloody Monster from Space
overview: Mad scientist trying to make dino-human hybrids! Tits! Wife killing clowns! Rubber monsters! Idiots! Christian boy-scout nut who thinks the devil is taking over! More idiots! Some blood, more tits! And a bucket load of humor!
tagline: Le Monde Est Perdu [French] [Translation: The World Is Lost]
title: Terror of Prehistoric Bloody Monster from Space
